Name: Eye of the Storm - Justice League Case Files #061906.01
Flavor Text: File Entry: 061906.01 Recorded by: Green Lantern I knew Superman was in a hurry to get back to Metropolis to stop the incoming storm. But, I had the daily ritual of charging my ring to do first.
Game Text: All Universe card bonuses receive an additional *) this battle.

Name: Eye of the Storm - Justice League Case Files #061906.05
Flavor Text: File Entry: 061906.05 Recorded by: Superman The Parasite surprised us both. Having fought him before, I knew I had to act fast before Green Lantern not only lost his power, but his life!
Game Text: No cards with the word "Avoid" may be played this battle.

Name: Eye of the Storm - Justice League Case Files #061906.02
Flavor Text: File Entry: 061906.02 Recorded by: Superman Despite Green Lantern's relative inexperience with his power ring, the two of us were easily able to keep the damage from the storm to a minimum.
Game Text: Move all mission cards currently in the completed missions pile into the reserve missions pile.

Name: Eye of the Storm - Justice League Case Files #061906.08
Flavor Text: File Entry: 061906.08 Recorded by: Green Lantern We both knew that neither of us could touch the Parasite without some kind of protection. Fortunately, my power ring could create what we needed.
Game Text: Reserve character may use power cards to defend any front line character this battle.

Name: Eye of the Storm - Justice League Case Files #061906.10
Flavor Text: File Entry: 061906.10 Recorded by: Green Lantern In my short time as a superhero, I've seen and been in some powerful slugfests. None of them compare to seeing Superman take on the Parasite.
Game Text: Do not discard any duplicates for this battle.

Name: Eye of the Storm 6 - Take Out!"
Gangbuster™
Game Text: Teammate may play one Special card.
Numbers: Cost/Effect: 5 Strength to useActs as 3 Strength attack

Name: Eye of the Storm 5 - "Leftovers!"
Flavor Text: Green Lantern's Power Ring is almost out of energy, but he knows how to use what's left! Raising the ring, he projects a high-tech impervious armor around Superman. [ End ]

Name: Hazard™ - Split™

Name: Into the Depths - Justice League Case File #271266.02
Flavor Text: File Entry: 271266.02 Recorded by: Aquaman We were about to pick up Killer Croc's trail when, suddenly, Batman froze. He'd smelled the burning fuse from a "present" Croc had left behind.
Game Text: Level 1 Intellect Power cards may be used to avoid any numerical attack this battle.

Name: Huntress™ - Expert Tracker
Game Text: Huntress may cut opponent's Draw Pile. Discard to the Dead Pile the card cut to.

Name: Into the Depths - Justice League Case File #271266.04
Flavor Text: File Entry: 271266.04 Recorded by: Batman I'm unsure what provoked the rats, Croc's escape or our pursuit − it didn't matter. Only immediate action would save us from being their next meal.
Game Text: All level 1 Power card attacks cannot be blocked this battle.

Name: Into the Depths - Justice League Case File #271266.07
Flavor Text: File Entry: 271266.07 Recorded by: Batman The flood took both of us by surprise. But, Killer Croc should have known better than to try to drown Aquaman, the "King of the Seas".
Game Text: All Strength Power cards do not count in the venture total, for this battle.

Name: Huntress™ - Sneak Attack
Game Text: Acts as a level 6 Strength attack. May be played while Huntress is in Reserve. One Per Deck

Name: Huntress™ - Trained Gymnast
Game Text: Only attacks made with Universe cards may be played against Huntress for remainder of battle.

Name: Into the Depths - Justice League Case File #271266.09
Flavor Text: File Entry: 271266.09 Recorded by: Batman Speed was of the essence. While it was obvious Killer Croc was leading us into another trap, we both knew it was the only way to bring him down.
Game Text: All cards that can be placed to a character, exluding reserve, must be placed in this battle. Unplaceable cards remain in hand.

Name: Into the Depths - Justice League Case File #271266.10
Flavor Text: File Entry: 271266.10 Recorded by: Aquaman Croc used his "home court" advantage swiftly, and left me stunned and sinking into the quagmire. It was now Batman's turn to save my life.
Game Text: Remove 1 hit from the permanent record of one character, and put it in the permanent record of any teammate.

Name: Might over Mind - Justice League Case Files #179603.01
Flavor Text: File Entry: 179603.01 Recorded by: Superman Back with a new plan for global conquest, Brainiac picked a moment when I would be most vulnerable - the award ceremony at the White House.
Game Text: Choose 1 of opponent's front line characters. Chosen character may not play Specials this battle. Affected Specials are not discarded.

Name: Metropolis S.C.U.™ - Paramilitary Training
Game Text: Metropolis S.C.U. gains +1 to all actions for remainder of battle.

Name: Might over Mind - Justice League Case Files #179603.08
Flavor Text: File Entry: 179603.08 Recorded by: Superman I knew Brainiac could see Wonder Woman and myself approaching his ship on his scanners, but he wasn't prepared for our unorthodox entrance.
Game Text: Only Teamwork Universe cards that act as Strength attacks may be played this battle.

Name: Might over Mind - Justice League Case Files #179603.04
Flavor Text: File Entry: 179603.04 Recorded by: Wonder Woman The President was out of immediate danger. However I now had to try to break Brainiac's mental hold on Superman − a feat easier said than done!
Game Text: Choose 1 front line hero that cannot play any cards or be attacked this battle.

Name: Might over Mind - Justice League Case Files #179603.06
Flavor Text: File Entry: 179603.06 Recorded by: Superman While we suspected that Brainiac was after me and not the President, we could not leave him unprotected. Orion was more than willing to help out.
Game Text: Move the reserve character to the front line this battle. Return that character to reserve at the end of the battle.

Name: Might over Mind 1 - "We Have A Problem!"
Might over Mind - Justice League Case Files #179603.11
Flavor Text: File Entry: 179603.11 Recorded by: Wonder Woman As I fought with Brainiac, Superman raced ahead to stop the missile Brainiac had launched at the White House. Timing would be of the essence.
Game Text: No Teamwork Universe cards may be played this battle.

Name: Race Against Crime - Justice League Case Files #661216.04
Flavor Text: File Entry: 661216.04 Recorded by: Flash The Riddler's biker punks were tearing right at Batman and me - ready to turn us into fresh road kill. But Batman and I had other ideas.
Game Text: For each mission card in the defeated mission pile, draw 1 additional card. Discard if duplicate.

Name: Race Against Crime - Justice League Case Files #661216.06
Flavor Text: File Entry: 661216.06 Recorded by: Batman Flash and I were running out of time, and I knew we needed back-up in case we missed the Riddler's deadline. Hawkman was the obvious choice.
Game Text: "Any Hero" Specials, excluding BQ, may be placed this battle. If placed, only that character may use the Special.

Name: Race Against Crime - Justice League Case Files #661216.09
Flavor Text: File Entry: 661216.09 Recorded by: Flash Batman had already dealt with the first of the Riddler's missiles. Now I had to take out the second, or else Babylon Towers was toast!
Game Text: Switch any front line hero with the reserve hero.

Name: Race Against Crime - Justice League Case Files #661216.01
Flavor Text: File Entry: 661216.01 Recorded by: Batman In his latest escape from Arkham, the Riddler locked the security system with an endless logic puzzle while he slipped away. A clever play.
Game Text: No Intellect Power cards may be played this battle. Affected Power cards are not discarded.

Name: Race Against Crime - Justice League Case Files #661216.10
Flavor Text: File Entry: 661216.10 Recorded by: Flash Being the "Fastest Man Alive" also, unfortunately, means I make mistakes just as fast. I heard Batman's warning about the eyebeam too late.
Game Text: All attacks with an energy icon must be made against the same front line character this battle, until character is KO'd.
